tasks.title: Create Package Foundation
tasks.description: Generate pyproject.toml with Hatchling build system and dependencies: pydantic>=2.0, httpx, jinja2, jmespath. Create src/agentic_v2/ package structure with __init__.py files. Create tests/ directory structure with conftest.py. Create README.md with package description and installation instructions.

tasks.title: Define Core Pydantic Message Contracts
tasks.description: Implement contracts/messages.py with AgentMessage, StepResult, and WorkflowResult models using Pydantic v2 with extra='forbid' validation. Create base schemas for agent communication and workflow execution results.

tasks.title: Implement Base Tool Interface and Tier-0 File Operations
tasks.description: Create tools/base.py with BaseTool abstract class, ToolSchema, and ToolResult. Implement tools/builtin/file_ops.py with FileCopyTool and DirectoryCreateTool as tier-0 tools requiring no LLM.

tasks.title: Implement Tier-0 Transform Tools
tasks.description: Create tools/builtin/transform.py with JsonTransformTool and TemplateRenderTool as tier-0 tools for JSON manipulation and Jinja2 template rendering without LLM dependency.

tasks.title: Create Foundation Tests for Tier-0 Tools
tasks.description: Implement tests/test_tools.py with temporary directory fixtures and tests for FileCopyTool, DirectoryCreateTool, JsonTransformTool, and TemplateRenderTool. Ensure ≥80% coverage with @pytest.mark.tier0 markers.

notes: Focusing on package foundation and tier-0 tooling for iteration 1. All tasks are LLM-free (tier 0) for maximum reliability.
